body:
Hello, 
 
I have a web-service that produces static images from various sources using Quartz. 
 
Recently I wanted to add the capability of adding QTMovie screenshots there, but I'm having some issues. 
 
When the service is run by a user which currently has a graphical login, it works fine - I can load a QTMovie, and grab a frame from a specific time to be used in the image export. 
 
 
However, in the production environment, the app is run by a user which is not logged in. Everything else (Quartz) works fine, but QTMovie loading bails out with this: 
 
/SourceCache/QTOtherComponents/QuickTime-1674/MidVale/AVA_VP3_QT/Component/AVA_HDUtilitiesHW.c: CGGetOnlineDisplayList failed with code 1011 
/SourceCache/QTOtherComponents/QuickTime-1674/MidVale/AVA_VP3_QT/Component/AVA_HDUtilitiesHW.c: CGGetOnlineDisplayList failed with code 1011 
_RegisterApplication(), FAILED TO establish the default connection to the WindowServer, _CGSDefaultConnection() is NULL 
/SourceCache/QTOtherComponents/QuickTime-1674/MidVale/AVA_VP3_QT/Component/AVA_HDUtilitiesHW.c: CGGetOnlineDisplayList failed with code 1011 
 
Is there a way to work around this? I only want to get the poster image from that movie, nothing else. I can detect in my code when I'm not connected to the windowserver with CGGetOnlineDisplayList, so I can switch to a different code path if required. 
 
Regards, 
Orestis Markou _______________________________________________
